deprecated_light_fan_entity.description:
Fan entities have been added to the Lutron integration.
We detected that entity `{entity}` is being used in `{info}`

We have created a new fan entity and you should migrate `{info}` to use this new entity.

When you are done migrating `{info}` and are ready to have the deprecated light entity removed, disable the entity and restart KS Assistant.
deprecated_light_fan_entity.title: Detected Lutron fan entity created as a light

deprecated_light_fan_off.description:
Fan entities have been added to the Lutron integration.
Previously fans were created as lights; this behavior is now deprecated.

Your configuration just turned off a fan created as a light. You should migrate your scenes and automations to use the new fan entity.

When you are done migrating your automations and are ready to have the deprecated light entity removed, disable the entity and restart KS Assistant.

An issue will be created each time the incorrect entity is used to remind you to migrate.
deprecated_light_fan_off.title: The Lutron integration deprecated fan turned off

deprecated_light_fan_on.title: The Lutron integration deprecated fan turned on
